testsuite.name: Scenario: Restrict feedback date is in the future, view details page should forward to error

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Restrict feedback date is in the future, view details page should forward to error

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Restrict feedback date is in the future, view details page should forward to error

testcase.name: When I choose creating new assignment in "Student Readiness" unit from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Restrict feedback date is in the future, view details page should forward to error

testcase.name: Then Assignment Editor is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Restrict feedback date is in the future, view details page should forward to error

testcase.name: When enter Assignment name "Restricted Feedback 3"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Restrict feedback date is in the future, view details page should forward to error

testcase.name: When I click on the questions tab
testcase.classname: Scenario: Restrict feedback date is in the future, view details page should forward to error

testcase.name: And I click the new question button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Restrict feedback date is in the future, view details page should forward to error

testcase.name: And I click Response Area button to open the dialog and assert that the Choose Question Type page is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Restrict feedback date is in the future, view details page should forward to error

testcase.name: When I choose "Mathematical Formula" link from the dialog and complete the correct answer
testcase.classname: Scenario: Restrict feedback date is in the future, view details page should forward to error

testcase.name: And I click OK
testcase.classname: Scenario: Restrict feedback date is in the future, view details page should forward to error

testcase.name: Then I see the "Mathematical Formula" Question Widget in the question text section
testcase.classname: Scenario: Restrict feedback date is in the future, view details page should forward to error

testcase.name: And I save & close the new question in the assignment editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Restrict feedback date is in the future, view details page should forward to error

testcase.name: When I click on the set policies tab
testcase.classname: Scenario: Restrict feedback date is in the future, view details page should forward to error

testcase.name: Then I am on the Policy Editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Restrict feedback date is in the future, view details page should forward to error

testcase.name: When I click on the calendar icon next to the "Restrict Feedback Until" policy
testcase.classname: Scenario: Restrict feedback date is in the future, view details page should forward to error

testcase.name: Then I see the date picker
testcase.classname: Scenario: Restrict feedback date is in the future, view details page should forward to error

testcase.name: When I click the next month button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Restrict feedback date is in the future, view details page should forward to error

testcase.name: And I click to close the date picker
testcase.classname: Scenario: Restrict feedback date is in the future, view details page should forward to error

testcase.name: Then I see that the Restrict Feedback Until checkbox is set to true
testcase.classname: Scenario: Restrict feedback date is in the future, view details page should forward to error

testcase.name: When I save & close the assignment on the policies page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Restrict feedback date is in the future, view details page should forward to error

testcase.name: Then I see summary of the assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Restrict feedback date is in the future, view details page should forward to error

testcase.name: When I save and close the assignment summary details
testcase.classname: Scenario: Restrict feedback date is in the future, view details page should forward to error

testcase.name: Then the new assignment "Restricted Feedback 3" is visible in its own expanded column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Restrict feedback date is in the future, view details page should forward to error

testcase.name: When I navigate to the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Restrict feedback date is in the future, view details page should forward to error

testcase.name: And I am on "Class Homepage" page of "Demonstration Class" class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Restrict feedback date is in the future, view details page should forward to error

testcase.name: Then I launch the "Restricted Feedback 3" assignment in "Student Readiness" unit
testcase.classname: Scenario: Restrict feedback date is in the future, view details page should forward to error

testcase.name: When I submit the assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Restrict feedback date is in the future, view details page should forward to error

testcase.name: Then I see the submission report with warning text "Warning: There appears to be errors in one or more of your answers."
testcase.classname: Scenario: Restrict feedback date is in the future, view details page should forward to error

testcase.name: When I submit the assignment again
testcase.classname: Scenario: Restrict feedback date is in the future, view details page should forward to error

testcase.name: Then my score 0 out of 1 (0 %) is shown in a grade report
testcase.classname: Scenario: Restrict feedback date is in the future, view details page should forward to error

testcase.name: When I change the URL to view the details page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Restrict feedback date is in the future, view details page should forward to error

testcase.name: Then I am on the error page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Restrict feedback date is in the future, view details page should forward to error

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Restrict feedback date is in the future, view details page should forward to error
